topic.title: Roman Military in Britain
topic.description: Find books or publications on the Roman invasion or military occupation of Britain.

topic.title: Celtic Art
topic.description: Find information on Celtic artwork, paintings and architecture in Ancient Europe; publications describing the influence of Celtic art in later periods are also of relevance.

topic.title: Bombing of Japanese Cities
topic.description: Find accounts or collections of photos of the bombing of Japanese cities in the Second World War and/or descriptions of the difficulties suffered by surviviors.

topic.title: The Inquisition in Italy
topic.description: Find publications providing accounts of the influence of the Roman Catholic Inquisition in the Italian peninsula.

topic.title: Irish Emigration to North America
topic.description: Find publications which discuss the phenomenon and the causes of Irish emigration to North America in the nineteenth century.

topic.title: Women's Vote in the USA
topic.description: Find publications on movements or actions aimed at obtaining voting rights for women in the United States

topic.title: Big Game Hunting in Africa
topic.description: Real-life descriptions of big game hunting expeditions in Africa.

topic.title: The Wives of Hentry VIII
topic.description: Find non-fictional accounts, documents or reports regarding any or all of the wives of Hentry VIII.

topic.title: Gardening for Children
topic.description: Find books providing information for kids on how to start up a garden and to grow flowers or vegetables.

topic.title: Scary Movies
topic.description: Find publications discussing the making or describing the details of any horror film.

topic.title: Ancient Greek Coins
topic.description: Find books with information on coins in Classical Greece or any period in Greece B.C.

topic.title: Israeli Secret Service
topic.description: Find books with information on "Mossad", the Israelian Intelligence Agency.

topic.title: Churches in France
topic.description: Find publications on French religious buildings including churches, chapels, abbeys and cathedrals.

topic.title: Piano Lessons
topic.description: Find publications on how to learn to play the piano or how to improve piano playing skills.

topic.title: Trade Unions
topic.description: Find publications describing the organisation or the history of single trade unions or specific categories of unions; books on the organisation and the history of workers' unions in general are not pertinent.

topic.title: Gay Fiction
topic.description: Find novels or poetry that can be classified as male or female homosexual literature.

topic.title: Formula One Drivers
topic.description: Find books about the life and experiences of Grand Prix pilots.

topic.title: Modern Japanese Culture
topic.description: Find publications on modern Japanese culture and society.

topic.title: Scottish Music
topic.description: Find publications on traditional Celtic or Gaelic folk music from Scotland.

topic.title: Car Industry in Europe
topic.description: Find publications discussing the development of the European automobile industry.

topic.title: Watchmaking
topic.description: Find documents about the watch or clock making industry; both technical publications and histories of the watchmaking business are of interest.

topic.title: Man in Space
topic.description: Find publications describing manâ€™s conquest of space or individual manned space missions.

topic.title: British Women Authors
topic.description: Find books about female authors born or working in the UK.

topic.title: Journeys to Antarctica
topic.description: Find books or collections of photographs describing travels in Antarctica or to the South Pole.

topic.title: Eastern philosophy
topic.description: Find publications providing introductions to the philosophies or religions of Asia, especially China and India.

topic.title: Contrastive Analysis of Electoral Systems
topic.description: Find documents which compare and analyse different political or electoral systems.

topic.title: Web Advertising
topic.description: Find books about the distribution and impact of marketing campaigns on the World Wide Web / Internet.

topic.title: Multilingual Upbringing
topic.description: Find descriptions of the raising and education of children in more than one language.

topic.title: Food Allergies
topic.description: Find publications providing general introductions to food allergies and the prevention of such allergies.

topic.title: Pilgrimage to Santiago de Compostela
topic.description: Find descriptions of St. James' Way or the pilgrimage which leads to the Cathedral of Santiago de Compostela in Galicia in northwestern Spain.

topic.title: Famous Jazz Musicians
topic.description: Find biographies or stories about well-known singers or musicians of jazz.

topic.title: Vegetarianism
topic.description: Find books, which describe aspects or advantages and disadvantages of the vegetarian way of life.

topic.title: Solar Energy
topic.description: Find publications providing information on solar energy as a renewable energy resource.

topic.title: Soap-making
topic.description: Find publications that describe the production of soap or the soap industry.

topic.title: Counterfeiting Money
topic.description: Stories, details and techniques on the forgery of banknotes or coins.

topic.title: Pictures of Vintage Cars
topic.description: Books on "vintage cars" or "old cars" with pictures, illustrations or photos.

topic.title: Jousting in the Middle Ages.
topic.description: Find popular books describing the sport and chivalry of medieval knights or providing details on medieval tournaments including the rules and pageantry.

topic.title: African Americans and the American Civil War.
topic.description: Find documents describing the conditions and positions of both free African Americans and slaves during the American Civil War.

topic.title: Graphics Programming.
topic.description: Articles and manuals dealing with the programming of graphical applications.

topic.title: Bordeaux Wine Guides.
topic.description: Find Bordeaux wine guides.

topic.title: Salary Inequality between Sexes
topic.description: Find reports and books that discuss differences in pay and income between men and women.

topic.title: Homeopathic Cures for Children.
topic.description: Find books and articles dealing with homeopathic medical treatments for children.

topic.title: Recipes for Chocolate Desserts.
topic.description: Find books containing recipes for chocolate puddings.

topic.title: Youth Employment in Europe
topic.description: Books and reports providing information on the situation of youth employment in Europe, including information on policies to reduce unemployment.

topic.title: Women in the French Revolution.
topic.description: Find publications describing the role of women during the French Revolution.

topic.title: Gods in Greek Mythology.
topic.description: Find popular books on the gods and godesses of Greek mythology.

topic.title: 20th Century S. American Authors.
topic.description: Documents containing biographic information about South American authors of the twentieth century.

topic.title: World War I Aviation
topic.description: Documents dealing with the history of aviation during World War I.

topic.title: Wonders of the Ancient World
topic.description: Find popular books on the great and famous monuments of the ancient world.

topic.title: Gauguin and Tahiti
topic.description: Documents about the life of Paul Gauguin on the island of Tahiti.
